methods.name: Agile
methods.description: Iterative approach that delivers value through small, incremental changes

methods.name: Scrum
methods.description: Framework that helps teams work together through regular meetings and roles

methods.name: Test Driven Development
methods.description: Writing tests before writing the code that needs to be tested

methods.name: DRY
methods.description: Don't Repeat Yourself - each piece of knowledge must have a single representation

methods.name: KISS
methods.description: Keep It Simple, Stupid - simplicity should be a key goal and unnecessary complexity avoided

methods.name: Object Oriented Programming
methods.description: Programming paradigm based on the concept of objects containing data and methods

methods.name: REST
methods.description: Architectural style for distributed systems, particularly web services

methods.name: SASS
methods.description: CSS preprocessor that adds features like variables, nesting, and mixins

methods.name: Progressive Web Apps
methods.description: Web apps that use modern web capabilities to deliver app-like experiences

methods.name: Mobile First
methods.description: Design strategy that prioritizes designing for mobile devices first

methods.name: Responsive Web Design
methods.description: Approach to web design that makes web pages render well on all devices
